S04n425:2: athāpareṇa samayena kumārastadanyaiḥ kumārairamātyaputraiḥ sārdhaṃ kṛṣigrāmavalokayituṃ gacchati sma |
S04n425:3: avalokya ca kṛṣikarmāntamanyata udyānabhūmiṃ praviśati sma |
S04n425:4: saṃvignamanāstatra bodhisattva ekākī advitīyo'nucaṃkramyamāṇo'nuvicaran jambuvṛkṣamapaśyat prāsādikaṃ darśanīyam |
S04n425:7: āsādya ca viviktaṃ kāmairviviktaṃ pāpakairakuśalairdharmaiḥ savitarkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ prītisukhaṃ prathamaṃ dhyānamupasaṃpadya viharati sma |
S04n425:8: sa vitarkavicārāṇāṃ vyupaśamādadhyātmasaṃprasādāccetasa ekotibhāvādavitarkamavicāraṃ samādhijaṃ prītisukhaṃ dvitīyaṃ dhyānamupasaṃpadya viharati sma |
S04n425:9: sa prītervirāgādupekṣako viharati sma smṛtimān saṃprajānan |
S04n425:11: yattadāryā ācakṣate upekṣakaḥ smṛtimān sukhavihārī niṣprītikaṃ tṛtīyaṃ dhyānamusaṃpadya viharati sma |
S04n425:12: sa sukhasya ca prahāṇādduḥkhasya ca prahāṇāt pūrvameva ca saumanasyadaurmanasyayorastaṃgamādaduḥkhāsukhamupekṣāsmṛtipariśuddhaṃ caturthaṃ dhyānamupasaṃpadya viharati sma ||
S04n425:13: tena ca samayena pañca ṛṣayo bāhyāḥ pañcābhijñāḥ ṛddhimanto vihāyasaṃgamā dakṣiṇāyā diśa uttarāṃ diśaṃ gacchanti sma |
S04n425:14: te tasya vanakhaṇḍasyopari gacchantaḥ pratyāhatā iva na śaknuvanti sma gantum |
S04n425:17: gaja iva sahakāraśākhākulāṃ vṛkṣavṛndāṃ pradāritva nirdhāvitānekaśaḥ |
S04n425:18: vayamiha marūṇāṃ pure cāpyasaktā gatā yakṣagandharvaveśmani cordhvaṃ nabhe niśritā
S04n425:19: ima puna vanakhaṇḍamāsādya sīdāma bhoḥ kasya lakṣmī nivarteti ṛddherbalam ||1 || iti ||
S04n425:20: atha yā tatra vanakhaṇḍadevatā sā tānṛṣīn gāthayādhyabhāṣat—
S04n425:25: tataste'dhastādavalokayanto'drākṣuḥ kumāraṃ śriyā tejasā ca jājvalyamānam |
S04n425:38: āho vajradharasya caiva pratimā candro'tha sūryo hyayam |
S04n425:39: kāmāgrādhipatiśca vā pratikṛtī rūdrasya kṛṣṇasya vā
S04n425:40: śrīmān lakṣaṇacitritāṅgamanagho buddho'tha vā syādayam ||3 || iti ||
S04n425:41: tataḥ sā vanadevatā tānṛṣīn gāthayā pratyabhāṣat—
S04n425:42: yā śrī ca vaiśravaṇe ca vai nivasate yā vā sahasrekṣaṇe
S04n425:44: brahme yā ca sahāpatau nivasate kṛṣṇe ca yā ca śriyā
S04n425:45: sā śrī prāpya imaṃ hi śākyatanayaṃ nopaiti kāṃcitkalām ||4 ||
S04n425:46: atha khalu te ṛṣayastasyā devatāyā vacanamupaśritya dharaṇītale pratiṣṭhante |
S04n425:47: te paśyanti sma bodhisattvaṃ dhyāyantamāniñjyamānena kāyena tejorāśimiva jvalantam |
S04n425:51: ayaṃ taṃ prāpsyate dharmaṃ yajjagad hlādayiṣyati ||5 ||
S04n425:64: atha khalu te ṛṣayo bodhisattvamābhirgāthābhirabhistutvā tripradakṣiṇīkṛtya vihāyasā prakrāntāḥ |
S04n425:65: rājāpi śuddhodano bodhisattvamapaśyan bodhisattvena vinā na ramate sma |
S04n425:69: tato'nyatama amātyo bodhisattvaṃ paśyati sma jambucchāyāyāṃ paryaṅkaniṣaṇṇaṃ dhyāyantam |
S04n425:70: sarvavṛkṣāṇāṃ ca tasmin samaye chāyā parivṛttābhūt |
S04n425:71: jambucchāyā ca bodhisattvasya kāyaṃ na vijahāti sma |
S04n425:72: sa taṃ dṛṣṭvā āścaryaprāptastuṣṭa udagra āttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajātaḥ śīghraṃ śīghraṃ tvaramāṇarūpo rājānaṃ śuddhodanamupasaṃkramya gāthābhyāmadhyabhāṣata—
S04n425:74: yathā śakro'thavā brahmā śriyā tejena śobhate ||10 ||
S04n425:76: sainaṃ na jahate chāyā dhyāyantaṃ purūṣottamam ||11 ||
S04n425:77: atha rājā śuddhodano yena sa jambuvṛkṣastenopasaṃkrāmat |
S04n425:80: hutāśano vā girimūrdhni saṃsthitaḥ śaśīva nakṣatragaṇānucīrṇaḥ |
S04n425:81: vepanti gātrāṇi mi paśyato imaṃ dhyāyantu tejo nu pradīpakalpam ||12 ||
S04n425:83: yadā cāsi mune jāto yadā dhyāyasi cārciman |
S04n425:84: ekadvirapi te nātha pādau vande vināyaka ||13 ||
S04n425:85: tatra triphalavāhakā dārakāḥ śabdaṃ kurvanti sma |
S04n425:86: tānamātyā evamāhuḥ- mā śabdaṃ mā śabdaṃ kārṣṭeti |
S04n425:100: kiṃ te gṛhe nivasato hi yathā dvijasya
S04n425:104: na ca mātu naiva ca pituḥ prativedayitvā
S04n425:113: catvāri dhyāna śubha dhyāyi sa bodhisattvaḥ ||19 ||
S04n425:130: parivṛtta sūrya na jahī sugatasya chāyā
S04n425:135: saṃpṛcchate kva nu gataḥ sa hi me kumāraḥ |
S04n425:146: mukuṭaṃ ca khaṅga tatha pāduka chorayitvā
S04n425:163: tasmin kṣaṇe puravaraṃ puna so pravekṣī |
